channel.title: Github-Pages on FrostLabs
channel.description: Recent content in Github-Pages on FrostLabs

item.title: "From Self-Hosted Complexity to GitHub Pages Simplicity: Building a Hugo Site with Blowfish"
item.description: Building a personal blog should be straightforward, but like many homelab enthusiasts, I initially overcomplicated things. What started as a simple Hugo site deployment turned into a learning experience about when to embrace simplicity over self-hosted complexity.
